sections.subtitle: A few words about me
paragraph: I am Kenan Ćurevac, a 27-year-old engineer with a Bachelor's degree in Traffic Engineering from the University of Sarajevo, where I also live. The German language and culture have been part of my life since childhood, which is reflected in my fluent German skills - I grew up watching German television!

I gained one and a half years of experience in the field of quality assurance (QA). This time helped me develop a strong understanding of reliability and teamwork. I also have a strong affinity for mathematics. Even in school, I took part in math competitions and discovered my enjoyment of analytical thinking.

I place great importance on detail-oriented work and consider myself a solution-oriented team player. I am motivated to continuously develop myself and to keep learning and growing throughout my professional life. Let's get to know each other - feel free to take a look at my projects. I look forward to hearing from you!

sections.subtitle: Studies
sections.paragraph: I hold a Bachelor's degree in Traffic Engineering from the University of Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina, with a focus on road traffic.

sections.subtitle: Languages
sections.paragraph: I hold a C1 certificate in German from the Goethe-Institut. In addition, I speak fluent English at a C1 level.

sections.subtitle: QA at Bloola GmbH
sections.paragraph: As a QA at the German company Bloola GmbH, I was responsible for conducting manual tests of a web app. Both communication with international colleagues and test documentation were conducted in English.

sections.subtitle: Position as a Call Agent
sections.paragraph: As a Call Agent in a call center, I was able to significantly develop my skills in communication, empathy, and sales. I was responsible for supporting and advising German customers as well as closing contracts for electricity, gas, internet, and telephone services.

paragraph: Quiz-App ist eine interaktive Quiz-Anwendung, die aus 10 Fragen mit jeweils vier Antwortmöglichkeiten besteht. Nach Beantwortung aller Fragen erhält der Nutzer eine Auswertung seiner Antworten.
Technologies: React, TypeScript, Material UI, The Trivia API
Film Atlas is a comprehensive film database that allows users to search for movies, TV series, and people working in the film and television industry, and to access detailed information about them.

The database not only lists current theatrical releases and popular series, but also provides a preview of upcoming movies (with trailers) and shows, as well as an overview of TV series currently airing. The offering is rounded out by top lists of the highest-rated productions.
Technologien: React, TypeScript, Material UI, The Movie Database API
